EmailTemplate.name: CITGO- Follow Up After Phone Call- Soft Savings
EmailTemplate.subject: CITGO Fleet Card: Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for taking my call today; I enjoyed the opportunity to speak with you. I am confident that our fleet card is the perfect tool to help you save time and money in managing your vehicle fueling expenses.
LOWER FUEL COSTS
Save up to 15%* on fuel by tracking usage and setting purchase or product limits Prevent unauthorized card use by using our detailed transaction reports which identify unique driver spending
SAVE TIME
Eliminate administrative time sorting through receipts and reimbursing drivers Reduce time spent on fiscal reporting with our month to-date and year-to-date reporting
CONVENIENCE & SAVINGS
Access to over 5,500 CITGO locations in 27 states, and the option for more flexibility with our Universal Card welcome at over 90% of all U.S. fueling locations. Earn valuable rebates of up to 5 cents per gallon when fueling at CITGO locations*
I will be following up with you next week. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to meeting with you about the needs of your business.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*Actual savings may vary.
** Rebates earned only on gallons fueled at CITGO branded stations and are subject to change at any time without prior notice
